vote.title: Authorize settlement in lieu of proceeding further with the condemnation proceedings styled City of Dallas v. Clams Casino LLC, et al., Cause No. CC-20-02647-A, pending in Dallas County Court at Law No. 1, to acquire a tract of land containing approximately 2,257 square feet of land in Dallas County for the Lower Eastbank Interceptor Project - Not to exceed $65,500.00 increased from $177,000.00 ($172,000.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $5,000.00) to $242,500.00 ($237,500.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $5,000.00) - Financing: Wastewater Capital Improvement F Fund
